Articles.Content: Here's another faceted surface stealth prototype of mine, the X-2 StarKiller. Again, like the X-1 StarFighter, it has very surprising stability, although it can't climb as high as it's predecessor, it still makes up in power. It tends to flap a little bit with SAS on, but not so bad that it's annoying. The flapping will subside once it gets past 8,000 metres. Once again, Happy Flying!
